item.title: 拉加德的欧洲央行日记显示她曾在四月会见世界经济论坛主席施瓦布
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德的官方日记证实，她确实在 4 月份与克劳斯-施瓦布见过面，施瓦布声称这次会面的重点是她提前辞职的问题。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde’s official diary confirms that she did meet Klaus Schwab in April, in an encounter that he claims was focused on her early resignation.】

item.title: 数十亿银行贷款为巴拿马赢得了时间，因为巴拿马即将跌入 "垃圾股 "行列
item.description: 交易商们担心巴拿马总统若泽-劳尔-穆利诺的借贷狂潮迟早会适得其反，因此质疑巴拿马债券今年的两位数涨势还能走多远。【原文：Traders are questioning how much further a double-digit rally in Panama bonds can go this year, concerned that President Jose Raul Mulino’s borrowing binge will backfire sooner or later.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体的比特币期权交易开辟了更快的盈利之路
item.description: 特朗普家族几乎涉足了加密货币行业的每一个角落，从去中心化金融项目到memecoins 和比特币挖矿，再到交易所交易基金。【原文：The Trump family has pushed into just about every corner of the crypto industry, from a decentralized finance project to memecoins and Bitcoin mining to exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: Lyft 计划 2026 年在美国推出本特勒自动驾驶班车
item.description: Lyft 公司正与总部位于奥地利的制造商本特勒集团（Benteler Group）合作，计划于 2026 年底在美国部署自动驾驶班车，试图在提供无人驾驶乘车服务方面赶上竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. is partnering with Benteler Group, an Austria-based manufacturer, to deploy autonomous shuttles in the US in late 2026, trying to catch up with rival Uber Technologies Inc. in offering driverless rides.】

item.title: 三名矿工在地下工作 60 小时后从纽蒙特矿井获释
item.description: 经过纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）所谓的 "缜密执行 "救援计划后，被困在加拿大一座金矿坠落瓦砾后面的三名矿工已安全返回地面。【原文：Three miners who were trapped behind fallen debris at a Canadian gold mine are safely back on the surface after what Newmont Corp. called a “meticulously executed” rescue plan.】

item.title: 美联储表示对特朗普参观建筑工地感到 "荣幸
item.description: 美联储周五发表声明，感谢唐纳德-特朗普总统和共和党议员周四参观央行的翻新项目。【原文：The Federal Reserve released a statement Friday thanking President Donald Trump and Republican lawmakers for visiting the central bank’s renovation project on Thursday.】

item.title: 德国热泵销量首次超过燃气锅炉
item.description: 德国热泵的销量首次超过燃气锅炉，因为禁止使用不洁供暖系统迫使人们转向使用清洁能源。【原文：Sales of heat pumps in Germany surpassed gas boilers for the first time as a ban on dirty heating systems forces a shift to cleaner energy.】

item.title: 政策不确定性导致美国核心资本货物订单下降
item.description: 6 月份，美国工厂的商业设备订单出乎意料地减少，表明由于贸易和财政政策的不确定性，企业对资本支出仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Orders placed with US factories for business equipment unexpectedly declined in June, suggesting companies remained cautious about capital spending due to trade and fiscal policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 在唐纳德-特朗普征收 50%关税的最后期限到来之前，巴西的年通胀率有所上升
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对南美国家征收惩罚性关税，巴西的通胀率在七月初有所上升，这使得巴西央行的消费价格前景进一步复杂化。【原文：Brazil’s inflation edged up in early July as US President Donald Trump threatened to slap the South American nation with punishing tariffs, further complicating the consumer price outlook for the central bank.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称英国增长计划面临重大挑战
item.description: 国际货币基金组织警告说，面对不断加剧的全球贸易紧张局势和财政限制，英国必须克服其增长和投资议程所面临的 "重大挑战"。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has warned that the UK must overcome “significant challenges” to its growth and investment agenda in the face of rising global trade tensions and fiscal constraints.】

item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：African borrowers are regaining access to international capital markets, offering governments and companies a fresh opportunity to diversify their funding sources after years of being locked out, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 尼日利亚奈拉债券跑赢新兴市场债券，因为蒂努布的改革受到关注
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）的改革引发了新兴市场最大的债券反弹，因为政府收入增加、通胀放缓和货币稳定支撑着这个西非国家两位数的利差收益率。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu‘s reforms are sparking the biggest bond rally in emerging markets as the West African nation’s two-digit carry yields are backed by increasing government revenue, slowing inflation and a stable currency.】

item.title: 特朗普对清洁能源斗争的升级给生产商带来更多痛苦
item.description:

item.title: 互联网用户流失，利润不佳，Charter 股价暴跌
item.description: 宪章通信公司（Charter Communications Inc. 报告称，由于移动公司的 5G 和光纤家庭互联网产品带来的压力增大，该公司第二季度流失的互联网客户数量超过预期，导致该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Charter Communications Inc. shares tumbled after the company reported it lost more internet customers than expected during the second quarter amid increased pressure from mobile companies’ 5G and fiber home internet offerings.】

item.title: ComEd 首席执行官寻求制定规则防止人工智能推高能源账单
item.description: 芝加哥最大的能源供应商负责人呼吁制定新规则，以遏制人工智能热潮对消费者电费的影响。【原文：The head of Chicago’s biggest energy supplier has called for new rules to curb the impact of the artificial intelligence boom on consumers’ electricity bills.】

item.title: 运输沙特柴油的超级油轮驶向燃料短缺的欧洲
item.description: 一艘超级油轮正从中东运载柴油，前往燃料匮乏的欧洲市场，这反映出该地区的供应紧张。【原文：A supertanker carrying a cargo of diesel from the Middle East is en route to the fuel-starved European market, reflecting supply tightness in the region.】

item.title: 预算缺口目标缩减后加纳美元债券攀升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在加纳政府降低了 2025 年的预算赤字目标后，加纳的美元债券周五升至历史新高。【原文：Ghana’s dollar bonds rose to a record high on Friday after the government reduced its budget-deficit target for 2025.】

item.title: Meta 将停止在欧盟销售政治广告，理由是受到监管
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将停止在欧盟销售政治和议题广告，理由是该公司认为新法规造成了 "难以承受的复杂性和法律不确定性"。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will stop selling political and issue-focused advertising in the European Union, citing new regulations that the company believes creates “an untenable level of complexity and legal uncertainty.”】

item.title: 被困在不列颠哥伦比亚省纽蒙特矿山的矿工已获救
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省伊斯库特（美联社）— 被困在加拿大西部一座金铜矿的三名工人在井下工作 60 多个小时后获救。【原文：ISKUT, British Columbia (AP) — Three workers who were trapped at a gold and copper mine in Western Canada have been rescued after more than 60 hours underground.】

item.title: Sarepta-Roche 基因疗法未能获得欧盟监管机构批准
item.description: 罗氏控股公司的基因疗法 Elevidys 未能获得欧洲监管机构的支持。【原文：Roche Holding AG’s gene therapy Elevidys failed to get the backing of European regulators.】

item.title: 埃拉拉称英国贸易协议将使印度国内生产总值提高四分之一个百分点
item.description: Elara Capital 公司称，印度与英国签署的自由贸易协定可在未来五年内将亚洲第三大经济体的增长速度提高四分之一个百分点。【原文：India’s free trade agreement with UK can boost growth for Asia’s third largest economy by a quarter point over the next five years, according to Elara Capital.】

item.title: 俄罗斯选择在经济降温之际将关键利率进一步下调至 18
item.description: 由于通胀放缓，人们越来越担心正在降温的经济可能会陷入衰退，俄罗斯央行将其关键利率降至近一年来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s central bank slashed its key interest rate to the lowest level in nearly a year amid slowing inflation and growing worries the cooling economy could tip into recession.】

item.title: 在 Des Dorides 辞职后，Nayara 任命了新的首席执行官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，继亚历山德罗-德斯-多里德斯（Alessandro des Dorides）上周辞职后，俄罗斯巨头罗斯涅夫特石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）部分持股、最近受到欧盟制裁打击的纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）已任命了新的首席执行官。【原文：Nayara Energy Ltd., a company partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC and recently hit by EU sanctions, has appointed a new chief executive officer following the resignation of Alessandro des Dorides last week, according to people familiar with the development.】

item.title: 中国的 Unitree 公司推出售价不到 6000 美元的仿人机器人
item.description: Unitree Robotics 公司正在销售世界上首批售价低于 6000 美元的仿人机器人之一，大大降低了入门价格，预计这将发展成为工作场所和家庭的一大波多功能人工智能机器。【原文：Unitree Robotics is marketing one of the world’s first humanoid robots for under $6,000, drastically reducing the entry price for what’s expected to grow into a whole wave of versatile AI machines for the workplace and home.】

item.title: 空中客车公司机翼工厂工人就薪酬问题举行罢工投票
item.description: 英国 3000 多名空中客车公司工人投票决定举行罢工，原因是这家飞机制造商提出的薪资待遇被他们称为不够合理。【原文：More than 3,000 Airbus SE workers in the UK have voted to go on strike over a pay offer from the aircraft manufacturer they have described as inadequate.】
